DOC.brief_summary: This project determine ultimate usefulness functional magnetic stimulation ( FMS ) assistive device void patient SCI .
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators intend determine ultimate usefulness functional magnetic stimulation ( FMS ) assistive device void patient SCI . Thirty six person recruit undergo 8 week protocol conditioning bladder . The investigator propose : investigate change bladder function response long-term bladder conditioning FMS ; optimize FMS technology parameter effective bladder empty SCI ; evaluate role external sphincter muscle fatigue FS facilitate bladder emptying ; critically evaluate relative response FMS data exist information use functional electrical stimulation ; develop criterion use predict SCI patient optimally suitable FMS ; establish comprehensive stimulation criterion reflect safety effectiveness structure associate bladder expose electro-myographic field .
DOC.criteria: Patients SCI T10 level , six month post injury
DOC.keyword: Bladder , electromagnetic field , Spinal cord injury
